00019 const ConstMap<std::string,int> DataAs = ConstMap<std::string,int>
00020     ("row",CV_PCA_DATA_AS_ROW)

00023 
00031 void mexFunction( int nlhs, mxArray *plhs[],
00032                   int nrhs, const mxArray *prhs[] )
00033 {
00034     if (nrhs<2 || nlhs>1)
00035         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00036     
00037     // Determine argument format between constructor or (id,method,...)
00038     vector<MxArray> rhs(prhs,prhs+nrhs);
00039     int id = 0;
00040     string method;
00041     if (nrhs>1 && rhs[0].isNumeric() && rhs[1].isChar()) {
00042         id = rhs[0].toInt();
00043         method = rhs[1].toString();
00044     }
00045     else
00046         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Invalid arguments");
00047     
00048     // Big operation switch
00049     if (method == "new") {
00050         obj_[++last_id] = PCA();
00051         plhs[0] = MxArray(last_id);
00052         return;
00053     }
00054     
00055     PCA& obj = obj_[id];
00056     if (method == "delete") {
00057         if (nrhs!=2 || nlhs!=0)
00058             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Output not assigned");
00059         obj_.erase(id);
00060     }
00061     else if (method == "compute") {
00062         if (nrhs<3 || (nrhs%2)!=1 || nlhs!=0)
00063             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00064         Mat data(rhs[2].toMat());
00065         Mat mean;
00066         int flags=CV_PCA_DATA_AS_ROW;
00067         int maxComponents=0;
00068         for (int i=3; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00069             string key(rhs[i].toString());
00070             if (key=="Mean")
00071                 mean = rhs[i+1].toMat();
00072             else if (key=="DataAs")
00073                 flags = DataAs[rhs[i+1].toString()];
00074             else if (key=="MaxComponents")
00075                 maxComponents = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00076             else
00077                 mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00078         }
00079         obj(data, mean, flags, maxComponents);
00080     }
00081     else if (method == "project") {
00082         if (nrhs!=3 || nlhs>1)
00083             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00084         plhs[0] = MxArray(obj.project(rhs[2].toMat()));
00085     }
00086     else if (method == "backProject") {
00087         if (nrhs!=3 || nlhs>1)
00088             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00089         plhs[0] = MxArray(obj.backProject(rhs[2].toMat()));
00090     }
00091     else if (method == "eigenvectors") {
00092         if (nrhs==3 && nlhs==0)
00093             obj.eigenvectors = rhs[2].toMat();
00094         else if (nrhs==2 && nlhs==1)
00095             plhs[0] = MxArray(obj.eigenvectors);
00096         else
00097             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00098     }
00099     else if (method == "eigenvalues") {
00100         if (nrhs==3 && nlhs==0)
00101             obj.eigenvalues = rhs[2].toMat();
00102         else if (nrhs==2 && nlhs==1)
00103             plhs[0] = MxArray(obj.eigenvalues);
00104         else
00105             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00106     }
00107     else if (method == "mean") {
00108         if (nrhs==3 && nlhs==0)
00109             obj.mean = rhs[2].toMat();
00110         else if (nrhs==2 && nlhs==1)
00111             plhs[0] = MxArray(obj.mean);
00112         else
00113             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00114     }
00115     else
00116         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized operation");
00117 }
